tool_description: Discover water presence and obtain OpenStreetMap tile details with Bosun's Water Check, your geospatial water detection service.
name: Bosun's Water Check
title: Bosun's Water Check

api_list.name: OSM Tile Details By URL
api_list.description:
Return various details about an OSM Tile. 

Including center lat and long, the maximum and minimum lat and long. And all the 4 corner coordinates.

api_list.name: Is Coordinate Water?
api_list.description: Determine water presence at specified coordinates

api_list.name: OSM Tile URL by x, y and zoom
api_list.description: While providing OSM x, y and zoom values, this endpoint return an OSM url.

api_list.name: OSM tile URL by lat, long and zoom level
api_list.description: Retrieve an OSM Tile URL for a specific coordinate and zoom level. Zoom level can be between 1 and 19.
